com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.utils

Class DynamicPackageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.utils.DynamicPackageUtils

  • public class DynamicPackageUtils
extends Object
    Helper class to get package or app related information.

        public static boolean isPackageExists(Context context,
                                      String packageName)
        Checks if a given package name exits.
        Parameters:

        packageName - The package name to be checked.
        Returns:
